name: DOOM PUZZLER
description:
This is a MashUP of two games 

Its a mixture of Word of Wonders (Mobile game) with  Infinite runner shooting game 

How to play the game

1) Players have to guess words from given letters

2) Doing so will increase your progress 

3) Avoiding a enemy leads to decline your progress

4) Player can match 3 letter to 4 letter words max

This is just a prototype So, there are some minor bugs to fix in future versions of the game but the game is playable from start to finish

Took references from DOOM art for developing this fan game
